TruckArmoured.name: Dunne Leatherback 2a
TruckArmoured.description: A heavy, reinforced Dunne transport. Fitted with a heavier frame, the Leatherback is capable of enduring more punishment at the cost of initial acceleration.

TruckTracked.name: Dunne Landrunner 12c
TruckTracked.description: This standard Truck is fitted with rugged off-road treads, allowing for more efficient movement on rough terrain and conditions at the expense of maximum speed.

SmallGaugeEngine.name: BMS Mineseeker
SmallGaugeEngine.description: The Mineseeker is the Bassett Motor Society's mechanized mule. This small 0-4-0 locomotive can haul tonnes of weight over short distances with little overhead. Ideal for a mining operation or short-range supply chains.

SmallGaugeResource.name: BMS Railtruck
SmallGaugeResource.description: A small gauge container car for transporting raw materials.

SmallGaugeFlatbed.name: BMS Linerunner
SmallGaugeFlatbed.description: A low profile flatbed car for transporting large resources and munitions over short distances on small gauge tracks.

ACBonesaw.name: O'Brien V. 113 Gravekeeper
ACBonesaw.description: A slight variation of the V.110, the Gravekeeper comes fitted with an embedded Bonesaw launcher, transforming the humble armoured car into an effective indirect anti-armour vechicle.
damageInfo: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Additional 100% chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

ACTracked.name: O'Brien V. 121 Highlander
ACTracked.description: Fitted with all-terrain treads, the Highlander brings significant all-terrain mobility and performs especially well in snowy and mountainous enviroments.

ACFlame.name: O'Brien V. 130 Wild Jack
ACFlame.description: While the Noble Firebrand Mk. XVII is a deadly flamethrower tank, a more efficient means of employing flame weapons was needed. Enter the Wild Jack. Named for the fiery idols mady by children for Dead Harvest, the Wild Jack is a variation of the Highlander.

ACHeavy.name: O'Brien V. 101 Freeman
ACHeavy.description: This early O'Brien variant, the V.101 Freeman is fitted with a 360 degree ballistics cannon turret at the expense of top speed.

LightUtilitySpitfire.name: Drummond Spitfire 100d
LightUtilitySpitfire.description: This LMG-mounted Light Utility Vechicle provides a heavy-duty weapons platform with superior speed. Perfectly suited for supporting flanking infantry or an armoured assault.

LightUtilityDuckJeep.name: Drummond Loscann 55c
LightUtilityDuckJeep.description: This amphibious Light Utility Vechicle has been heavily modified to cross rivers and lakes with ease. Venturing out into the open sea is ill-advised, however.

HalfTrackRocket.name: Niska-Rycker Mk. IX Skycaller
HalfTrackRocket.description: A first of its kind, the Skycaller is a variation of the Niska Motor Carriage with a Rycker designed rocket battery fited in the rear bed. This unique armoured vehicle quickly fires rockets over long distances with ease, and can be rearmed and relocated at the drop of a hat. The Skycaller is the deadly result of combined Nevish and Caoivish engineering.
HalfTrackRocket.baseVehicle: Niska Mk. I Gun Motor Carriage (Half-Track)

FieldRocketLauncher.name: Rycker 4/3-F Wasp Nest
FieldRocketLauncher.description: Lyle Rycker first built a prototype of the Wasp Nest as a test for his rack mounted rocket batteries that would eventually find their way onto armoured vehicles. Capable of firing twelve compact rockets in quick succession, the Wasp Nest became a quick favourite of the Warden infantry testing it, so an official design was requisitioned.

HalfTrackAntiTank.name: Niska Mk. II Blinder
HalfTrackAntiTank.description: Fitted with a heavy-duty anti-tank gun, the Blinder is capable of punching through all but the most tempered of alloys.
HalfTrackAntiTank.baseVehicle: Niska Mk. I Gun Motor Carriage (Half-Track)

Harvester.name: BMS - Scrap Hauler
Harvester.description: The Scrap Hauler, designed by the Bassett Motor Society is a heavy-duty piece of machinery designed to reduce scrap metal and other materials into usable, raw resources. Scrap Haulers are often used to extract battlefield resources following skirmishes.

ScoutTankGallant.name: King Gallant Mk. II
ScoutTankGallant.description: A heavily armoured variant of the King Spire, the Gallant Mk. II boasts a weighty 30mm cannon at the cost of top speed.

TankDestroyerFlame.name: Noble Firebrand Mk. XVII
TankDestroyerFlame.description: In response to the Legion embarking on aggressive northern offensives, the Firebrand is designed to conflagrate and eradicate their garrisons with ease. Built using the aggressive frame of the Widow, the Firebrand is a pure force of nature when paired with a secondary armoured escort.

LightTankMortar.name: Devitt-Caine Mk. IV MMR
LightTankMortar.description: A modified Devitt fitted with a specializes Cain mortar turret at the expense of top speed.
LightTankMortar.ammoUsed: Mortar Shell, Mortar Shrapnel Shell, Mortar Flare Shell

AssaultTankChieftan.name: Silverhand Chieftan - Mk. VI
AssaultTankChieftan.description: The Chieftan assault tank is fitted with asymmetrical armaments, including a 250mm mortar cannon and a twin-barreled 12.7mm turret.
damageInfo: Turret (Center): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot
Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

CruiserTankHighwayman.name: Gallagher Highwayman Mk. III
CruiserTankHighwayman.description: Colm Gallagher's engineers desginged a variation on the Outlaw that features an independently rotating MG turret sitting atop the main armament of twin anti-tank cannons. What it lack in raw firepower compared to its older sibling, the Highwayman more than makes up for it with versatility.
damageInfo: Engine can be boosted for increased top speed
Turret (Front): Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 50% less damage per shot

EmplacedAntiTankHeavy.name: Huber Starbreaker 94.5mm
EmplacedAntiTankHeavy.description: Built to compliment other free-standing artillery pieces, the emplaced Huber Starbreaker launches 94.5mm shells over very long distances. A necessary tool for infantry to knock back armoured Colonial advances.
damageInfo: Gunner (Left): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 50% extra damage per shot.

FieldCannonSuper.name: Balfour Stockade 75mm
FieldCannonSuper.description: This robust field cannon not only allows infantry to fire heavy 75mm shells with ease, but it provides state-of-the-art curved blast shielding for maximum protection from crossfire.

CruiserTankThornfall.name: Gallagher Thornfall Mk. VI
CruiserTankThornfall.description: Armed with a rack of Bonesaw mortar launchers, the Thornfall is designed to launch an indirect mechanized assault on enemy armour. This unique vehicle supports an allied assault and cannot withstand large amounts of punishment.
damageInfo: Engine can be boosted for increased top speed
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Additional 100% chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
